name: Abergavenny Food Festival
description: Wales's flagship food festival and one of Britain's most celebrated culinary gatherings. Held across Abergavenny's historic Market Hall, Castle grounds, and town centre venues, this two-day celebration brings together over 200 artisan producers, celebrity chefs, and food writers. Experience cooking demonstrations on the Gower Cottage Brownies Stage, tutored tastings at the Hensol Castle Drinks Theatre, and the legendary Cooking Over Fire stage. The Night Market transforms the castle grounds into an atmospheric evening destination with live music and street food. Free entry to most areas makes this accessible celebration of Welsh and international food culture unmissable.

entry.notes: Free entry to most festival areas. Some ticketed events including tutored tastings and evening parties.
